text: morning team trapit. Anything change on the RSS feeds overnight? I can’t seem to get anything to load in the Trapit content sections today
<@U02618EV1> is there a URL where I can see the thank you page?
<http://trdev.uncorkedstudios.com/thank-you>
sweeet thanks!
and has anybody from trapit seen that copy?
ran it by hank
can we change copy on that thank you screen?

Proposed change: "We’ll be in touch with you very soon (probably within 24 hours) to set up a time for your free demo.” 

to 

"We’ll be in touch within the next business day to set up a time for your free demo."
also - whatever bug was happening on Trapit content appears to be fixed now. Did we switch anything?
I’m concerned about the stability of that section overall and would love to hammer on it a bit to ensure we know what’s going on
oh yes we can definitely change it
(the copy)
re: copy - fantastic

<@U0289USNA>: any thoughts re: feeds? Seems like a few too many (potential) bugs going on with that. What can we do to increase stability? 

Right now, I’ve seen two core issues — 

1) Potential mismatch from Trapit HQ to site. We think this has been fixed, but have yet to officially confirm. 

2) Missing content entirely (‘oops. Try again in few minutes’ message).
i’d like to propose a test session with Trapit team today where they’re actively adding content in and we can see in realtime
or something like that
bottom line, we need to take proactive steps to ensure that the feed is stable
<@U0265G76F> re: #2 happened because I pushed new code but didn't re-start the server immediately after. That's been fixed.
ok
good to know
i saw it happen a few times yesterday too, which is why i’m concerned
but if we know WHY it happened, that’s another story
well - in general, given our non-official QA on this site, I’d love to hammer on it a bit
Yes. I believe the issue when we don't get anything from the feeds is fixed now.
sounds good on that front
I’d like to set up a testing time with Trapit team, as suggested above, to add new content in real time
That would be great. I'm open all day and ready for that.
ok cool
<@U0265G76F>: see gaston's note that he forgot to restart the server after he pushed our changes from yesterday.   With the changes from yesterday it should be stable now.
As we test today, anyone who sees something funny with the rss feeds should definitely speak up as they should be good to go and perfect as of now.
understood
i still want to have the 2:15 testing meeting
that we set up with trapit
if nothing else, we want to kick tires
it could take 5 min
yeah, that meeting is totally appropriate
cool
well it’s on the books!
<@U0265G76F> are we still doing the dev meeting at 11 today?
sorry - missed this

<@U0265G76F>: re: the masonry issue I was telling you about...
<@U02618EV1> says it can be accomplished but with a different plugin...it would be a not-minor update
3-ish hours
is it necessary for launch?
probably not necessary for launch
can we just fake it by reordering in CMS for now?
because we know where masonry will plot things out
also, while we’re all in here — Heard back from Hank re: State vs. Company state
they’re inclined (I agree) to keep it simple as just — State
yes i'll fake in the CMS, we'll have to reorder when the new plugin gets implemented.
k
After doing more research it looks like the plugin has a $90 license for commercial use
<http://isotope.metafizzy.co/license.html>
I'm in big conf room for our call in 2 mins.
Do we want Skype or call?
oh man - i forgot
i’m in a meeting
kelly is
kellmooo on skype
Perfect. Thanks.
thanks
Call is over. Everything seems to be working well.
YAH
awesome
I went ahead and told them they can send me a quick email if anything comes up so I can troubleshoot things in real time.
<@U0265G76F>: trapit got there server setup and I have root access to it so we can get in and do anything we need to for deployment.
<@U0260V1BX> <http://trap.hs-sites.com/blog/>
When you have a chance. Header and footer are missing some of the new stuff we added since the beginning of the week.
awesome
thanks gaston - i will make any notes on trello
